issue.title: [R] [CI] Need to gate duckdb examples on duckdb version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13490](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13490). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
rtools35 is failing due to the examples relying on using functions that have not yet been released by duckdb: https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/3188948753

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13490?focusedCommentId=17390090) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10831
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10831>
